name: Master Chef - King Cookes Shop
description:
Master Chef - King Cookes Shop is so Easy, Super Cooking is On and Chef is gone!Simple click, fun gaming experience!
So Much Fun in this game ,learn while you play !!!
Ever Wanted to make and server burgers,cookies,candies ,french fries etc, well wait no more ,download and move straight away to Restaurant making burgers in this fun filler delicious Kids game!
